'''Microsoft Gaming''' is an American multinational video game and digital entertainment brand of [[Microsoft]] based in Redmond, Washington, established in 2022. Through its [[Xbox Game Studios]], it is the current owner of [[Mojang Studios]], the developer of ''[[Minecraft]]''.
